DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of transverse supraumbilical incision over Pfannenstiel incision in performing cesarean section for morbid obese pregnant women.
DOC.brief_title: Transverse Supraumbilical Versus Pfannenstiel Incision for Cesarean Section in Morbidly Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: Research Question In Morbidly obese women undergoing cesarean section, is transverse supraumbilical incision superior to Pfannenstiel incision? Research Hypothesis Transverse supraumbilical incision is superior to Pfannenstiel incision in morbidly obese women undergoing cesarean section.
DOC.criteria: BMI more than 40 kg/m2 women scheduled for CS patients receiving steroids or anticoagulation
